products.title: Devon Sand Roller Blind
products.metadescription: Devon sand roller blind in brown. Made to measure from 15.13 with free uk mainland delivery. This roller blind includes 5-year guarantee and child safety features.
products.productdescription:
Taking influence from soft cloth fabric weaves, their devon range of roller blinds provide a stunning textured finish for your window dressing. Sand will introduce a stylish, earthy shade into your interiors. A fabulously warm grey/brown hue.
 
 Product id: sdb-rbx2244 fabric colour: sandstone material: 100% polyester headrail: durable aluminium roller tube supported by white steel brackets - top, face or side fix   control type: smooth continuous-looped chain energy saving rating: er2 - medium energy saving value - effective thermal retention light filtering: yes

products.title: Devonshire, Biscuit - Roman Blind
products.metadescription: Devonshire, biscuit - roman blind the devonshire in biscuit is created from a blend of cotton-like threads, woven to form a delicately textured cloth with a relaxed fall and sophisticated look, and showcasing a modern and versatile shade of beige to offer
products.productdescription: The devonshire in biscuit is created from a blend of cotton-like threads, woven to form a delicately textured cloth with a relaxed fall and sophisticated look, and showcasing a modern and versatile shade of beige to offer simple style with soothing and comforting colour.Blend the biscuit with alike fabrics for a rustic, country theme that incorporates alluring textures, merging the subtle beige tone with harmonising shades of caramel, mink, and cream to form a soothing palette for elegant style. Add a deep chocolate brown to the room for depth and character.Please note: roman blinds over 130cm wide require vertical seams due to limited fabric width. We recommended you split large windows into smaller blinds.

products.title: Devon Sand
products.metadescription: Buy made to measure devon sand standard vertical blinds from soeasy blinds. Order quality standard vertical blinds online today at low prices with fast uk delivery
products.productdescription:
Min width: 250mm max width: 5000mm
 	min drop: 500mm max drop: 3500mm
 	fabric composition: polyester
 	louvre width: 89mm
 	guarantee: 12 months
 	fittings: included
 	controls: cord control to open and close blind coordinated with headrail colour, chrome chain to tilt louvres. Controls can be positioned on the left or right.
 	Stack: a choice of left, right or split.
 	Louvres: louvres are supplied with top hangers and are available with bottom weights with stabilising chain or chainless bottom weights.
